attributes.action: ask the indigenous population of this country if they actually want a multi-cultural society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ask the indigenous population of this country if they actually want a multi-cultural society."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17600


Prime Minister's Office
